INDEX@stabletokens.name: INDEX token
INDEX@stabletokens.description: The INDEX token serves as an investment index on the WAX blockchain, aimed at long-term and minimally risky investments. You can read more in the White Paper

HERB@naturestoken.name: HERB
HERB@naturestoken.description: HERB tokens are the official currency for @HerbTipBot on Telegram, providing a 50% discount for token whitelisting and enhancing your Telegram chat experience with fun games and features. They're essential for maximizing your engagement within the bot's ecosystem.

USDT@usdt.alcor.name: USDT
USDT@usdt.alcor.description: Native USDT on EOS, Bridged to WAX Chain by Alcor team, using secure IBC technology. IBC are based on merkle root proof cryptography, it does not use any centralized point of management, or any back-end and third-party services. It's audited, secure solution for bridging tokens on Antelope chains. Bridge fee are 0% both ways, and process takes only ~2 minute.

BRWL@brawlertoken.name: Brawlers
BRWL@brawlertoken.description: Blockchain Brawlers is the first play-to-earn (P2E) game experience built by WAX Game Studios on the WAX Blockchain. You can collect Brawlers, equip them with gear and send them to Brawl in the Ring for rewards.

FWW@farmerstoken.name: Farmers World
FWW@farmerstoken.description: FarmersWorld is the first farming game to function on the NFTs platform. Pick for yourself suitable tools, exploit various resources, buy land to build enormous farms, and enjoy the fascinating experiences of a farmer working in Farmersworld’s Ecosystem.

HEELS@pinup24heels.name: PinupWarlords
HEELS@pinup24heels.description: PinupWarlords is a fun and fast-paced Play to Earn NFT trading card game, fully on-chain, with stunning ART and multi-PvP modes. It’s a game where players own the assets and can freely resell them and participate in its ecosystem.

MVT@miningvoxelt.name: MiningVoxels Token
MVT@miningvoxelt.description: MiningVoxels is a large play-to-earn game that simulates the real-world economy.

DBLN@dbln1wallet1.name: Doubloon
DBLN@dbln1wallet1.description: Doubloon is the official currency of the play to earn Serfdom & Sorcery Discord RPG

FRCT@token.parsec.name: Few Parsec Away
FRCT@token.parsec.description: Few Parsec Away is a captivating, massively multiplayer online game that combines both player-versus-player (PvP) and player-versus-environment (PvE) elements. It is a browser-based strategy game set in space, specifically within the solar system. Few Parsec Away is a free-to-play game based on blockchain technology, integrating elements related to NFTs and cryptocurrencies as premium features.

TLM@alien.worlds.name: Alien Worlds
TLM@alien.worlds.description: Alien Worlds is a Digital Item Metaverse in Faraway Space. Own land on distant planets, explore and find strange artefacts, mine for Trilium with hyper-advanced tools or fight using alien weapons.

MARTIA@martia.name: Colonize Mars
MARTIA@martia.description: Own part of the first-ever mars colony on the blockchain! Purchase supply crates, unlock unique cards, and upgrade them for a chance at owning different parts of the colony forever.

RLM@realmnftgame.name: Realm NFT Game
RLM@realmnftgame.description: Realm NFT's are playable, blockchain-based collectables for using in Realm, a play-to-earn resource management game. In Realm players strategically utilize their NFT Leaders, Helpers and Boosts to save the world from devastation.

HONEY@nfthivehoney.name: Honey
HONEY@nfthivehoney.description: Buy, Sell and Trade WAX NFTs - P2E Games - NFT Collectibles - NFT Tools: Set Builder, Bulk Operations, NFT Crafting, Drops

AETHER@e.rplanet.name: RPlanet
AETHER@e.rplanet.description: RPlanet assets are playable, blockchain-based collectibles for use in the game RPlanet Conquest.

NBMFUS@battleminers.name: NFT Battle Miners
NBMFUS@battleminers.description: NFT Battle Miners (NBM) is your portal to the Arcadian system, a massive multiplayer online universe where everyone can play for free and earn real money! In NBM, you can create your own character and play as a miner exploring Arcadia looking for its wealth. Trade, sell, upgrade, fight, the choice is yours!

NBMACT@battleminers.name: NFT Battle Miners
NBMACT@battleminers.description: NFT Battle Miners (NBM) is your portal to the Arcadian system, a massive multiplayer online universe where everyone can play for free and earn real money! In NBM, you can create your own character and play as a miner exploring Arcadia looking for its wealth. Trade, sell, upgrade, fight, the choice is yours!

NBMMIN@battleminers.name: NFT Battle Miners
NBMMIN@battleminers.description: NFT Battle Miners (NBM) is your portal to the Arcadian system, a massive multiplayer online universe where everyone can play for free and earn real money! In NBM, you can create your own character and play as a miner exploring Arcadia looking for its wealth. Trade, sell, upgrade, fight, the choice is yours!

WOMBAT@wombattokens.name: Wombat
WOMBAT@wombattokens.description: Wombat is your home for NFT-Gaming. Become part of the gaming revolution and play together with millions of gamers across the globe.

NOVO@tokens.novo.name: Novopangea
NOVO@tokens.novo.description: Novopangea is a fun and immersive MPOG experience where you build your economic empire across the six realms of Novopangea. You can purchase land, and buildings and produce resources to earn Obsidian. Take your Obsidian and then level up your in-game assets. As our game expands to PVP you will be able to produce specific resources that can be crafted with weapons, armor, accessories, and items.

ZBC@zombiecointk.name: Zombiecoin
ZBC@zombiecointk.description: Zombiecoin is an NFT resource gathering and crafting game on the WAX blockchain. Players perform work tasks to gather various resources. The resources are used in crafting and upgrading to higher tier materials. For example, walls can be made from wood and combined with other parts to build a house. You can also trade the resources and assets on the secondary market.

SEST@farmingtoken.name: Farming Tales
SEST@farmingtoken.description: A crypto farm where NFTs represent real products from real farms. The NFTs of this collection represent the tools that, every day, accompany the farmers in their hard work. By putting these tools together it is possible to generate new NFTs that are linked to real goods and products from our farms. Ownership of these NFTs therefore guarantees ownership of these products.

FGL@fgltokenmgmt.name: FGL
FGL@fgltokenmgmt.description: Cosmic Clash, Mecha World and Nifty Fish are part of the FGL ecosystem. Lucrative Gaming, aka “FGL” was founded in 2007 and pioneered web games, helping web and Flash developers get their games published and distributed at a time when the web game market was considered the “wild west”.

NEFTY@token.nefty.name: Nefty Blocks
NEFTY@token.nefty.description: NeftyBlocks is the #1 trade to Earn marketplace for buying, selling and creating digital collectibles.

MILK@starcadiamlk.name: Starcadia
MILK@starcadiamlk.description: Join the https://starcadia.io/ community with the explorers.

BLUX@bluxbluxblux.name: BLUX
BLUX@bluxbluxblux.description: cXc.world is a global map of Media NFTs. On-chain Ups curate local Top Charts and reward BLUX for votes and PURPLE for artists who make the daily Top 64 Charts. 1 BLUX makes 1 Up starting in cXc.world Beta. See the demo: youtu.be/coNc4iJB7OM

PURPLE@purplepurple.name: Purple
PURPLE@purplepurple.description: cXc.world is a global map of Media NFTs. On-chain Ups curate local Top Charts and reward BLUX for votes and PURPLE for artists who make the daily Top 64 Charts. PURPLE is stakable for daily return of Ups or BLUX. See the demo youtu.be/coNc4iJB7OM

SCRAP@token.gene.name: Scrap
SCRAP@token.gene.description: The Forge Arenas main utility token.

PXJ@pixeljourney.name: Pixel Journey
PXJ@pixeljourney.description: PXJ is the token of the Pixel Journey; an educational project with the topic of exploring everything Wax, and each of our widely connected ecosystems have to offer. PXJ is already paired up across 40 different LPs across Wax, offering a vast number of possibilities to pair up. PXJ will be required for Pixel Journey collectibles crafting, and may in the future get a role in our PixelDAO.
